accountAddressParameter.description: address in raw (hex without 0x) or base64url format
accountAddressParameter.name: account

accountsParameter.description: accounts for check new transactions (separate by comma) or use 'all' for subscribe to all accounts
accountsParameter.name: accounts

domainFilterParameters.description: domain filter for current auctions "ton" or "t.me"
domainFilterParameters.name: tld

jettonsParameter.description: jettons for check transfer (separate by comma)
jettonsParameter.name: jettons

nftsParameter.description: nfts for check transfer (separate by comma)
nftsParameter.name: nfts

BadRequest.description: Something went wrong on client side

InternalError.description: Something went wrong on server side

NotFound.description: The specified resource was not found

UnauthorizedError.description: Access token is missing or invalid

in_progress.description: Event is not finished yet. Transactions still happening
Event is not finished yet. Transactions still happening

info.description: Provide access to indexed TON blockchain
info.title: REST api to TON blockchain explorer

get.description: Get info about few accounts account by one request

parameters.description: accounts addresses in raw (hex without 0x) or base64url format
parameters.name: addresses

parameters.description: transaction hash in hex (without 0x) or base64url format
parameters.name: hash

parameters.description: address in raw (hex without 0x) or base64url format
parameters.name: account

parameters.description: omit this parameter to get last transactions
parameters.name: maxLt

parameters.description: omit this parameter to get last transactions
parameters.name: minLt

get.description: DNS back resolve for wallet address
Search domains by the first letters

parameters.description: omit this parameter to get last events
parameters.name: beforeLt

get.description: Get the event by event ID or hash of any transaction in trace

parameters.description: event ID or transaction hash in hex (without 0x) or base64url format
parameters.name: event_id

get.description: Get all Jettons balances by owner address
Get all Jetton transfers for account

parameters.description: address in raw (hex without 0x) or base64url format
parameters.name: jetton_master

get.description: Get jetton metadata by jetton master address
Get NFT collection by collection address
Get NFT item by its address

parameters.description: NFT items addresses in raw (hex without 0x) or base64url format
parameters.name: addresses

get.description: Get all NFT items from collection by collection address
Get all NFT items by owner address

parameters.description: address in raw (hex without 0x) or base64url format or word 'no' for items without owner
parameters.name: owner

parameters.description: address in raw (hex without 0x) or base64url format or word 'no' for items without collection
parameters.name: collection

parameters.description: include nft items which are currently are on market
parameters.name: include_on_sale

schema.description:
"TL-scheme: backup.delete sign:int512 primaryPublicKey:int256 voucher:backup.Voucher request_expire:int64 = backup.Delete" \
"TL-scheme: backup.voucher sign:int512 expire_at:int64 publicKey:int256 = backup.Voucher"

"TL-scheme: backup.get sign:int512 primaryPublicKey:int256 voucher:backup.Voucher request_expire:int64 = backup.Get" \
"TL-scheme: backup.voucher sign:int512 expire_at:int64 publicKey:int256 = backup.Voucher"

"TL-scheme: backup.send sign:int512 primaryPublicKey:int256 voucher:backup.Voucher request_expire:int64 payload:bytes = backup.Send" \
"TL-scheme: backup.voucher sign:int512 expire_at:int64 publicKey:int256 = backup.Voucher"

parameters.name: hash

parameters.name: hash
